title: One for all?
body:
I know riot's been busy with the production of a lot of new game modes such as the Invasion, Blood Moon, and Dark Star: Singularity gamemodes, but I think that one of the best (and my personal favourite) rotating gamemodes was One for All.

I find it strange that riot updated ascension and poro king to the new client, but One for All hasn't been seen in over a year.

Could we please get some love for this gamemode? It'd really make my year if you could include it at least once.

P.S Sorry if this is in the wrong board.

replies.body:
by far the most fun i have had on league, one for all is a wicked game mode, they always make for good youtube videos too, and funny game play
hope they bring it back again i miss it alot of people do.

just fucking put a random fun selection wich pick a random fun mode... or put a vote when people accept a game about 3 random gamemode
just fucking let us have fun instead of controlling us
Doesn't look like it since PBE has DOOM BOTS being tested for.
